articles.title: Sri Lankan Cabinet Resigns, Protesters Defy Curfew: 10 Points
articles.description: Sri Lanka's entire cabinet resigned from their posts Sunday as the ruling political clan seeks to resolve a mounting economic crisis
articles.content: • All 26 ministers in the cabinet aside from President Gotabaya Rajapaksa and his elder brother Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa submitted letters of resignation at a late-night meeting.

articles.title: In Ukraine Street, Body With Hands Tied, A Bullet Wound To The Head
articles.description: A man lay sprawled by the roadside in the Ukrainian city of Bucha on Sunday, his hands tied behind his back and a bullet wound to his head, one of hundreds of local residents that officials say have been found dead in the wake of Russian occupation.
articles.content:
Russia has said not a single local resident suffered from any violent actions. (File)
